table.name: vtiger_parsfax
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parsfax` ( `parsfaxid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `fax_record_no` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_sender_name` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_zone_charge_per_page` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_comment` text, `fax_sender_phone` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_resource` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_sms_charge` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_total_page_charge` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_sender_type` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_fax_type` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_received_phone` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_header` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_total_pages` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_status` varchar(128) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_submitted_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `fax_scheduled_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `fax_communication_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `fax_fax_file` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `fax_inventory_module` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`parsfaxid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_parsfaxcf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parsfaxcf` ( `parsfaxid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`parsfaxid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_parsfax_logs
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parsfax_logs` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `provider` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `filename` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `numbers` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `filepagecount` int(11) NOT NULL, `status` varchar(500) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=34 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_parsfax_providers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parsfax_providers` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `isactive` int(1) DEFAULT NULL, `providertype` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `parameters` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=5 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci

table.name: vtiger_parsfax_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_parsfax_settings` ( `settings_name` varchar(200) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `settings_value` text COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`settings_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci
